attributes.action: Bring back macaroni cheese bites in Wetherspoons
attributes.additional_details: They were very popular with a lot of people and I know that many would like this back
attributes.background: They removed a lot from the menu when Covid-19 happened

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions about what products to sell are a matter for individual hospitality venues, not the Government or Parliament.
